channel.title: Blogs on O-Despo
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on O-Despo

item.title: Current Tools
item.description: Given the start of the year and some recent changes to my desktop environment I thought a summation of my current software tools and why I use them might be of use / interest. As a programmer you build up a stack of tools you like and some you hate. There are no right or wrong answers here this is just what I prefer. My goal in settings up my environment is to make the process of using my computer efficient and enjoyable.

item.title: What This Blog Is For
item.description: Why This is here I want to make cool things. They don’t have to take a particular form they just need to be cool. It’s my belief that by making this little corner of the internet for me to share my thoughts I will be better motivated to make those cool things. There are no rules here except my own and no expectations except my own. So I think I will be an ideal space to share what I love and do.
